page.title: 10The old railway line
page.content: Since the old Yarmouth to Lowestoft railway branch line was closed some fifteen years ago the old railway land has mostly been lying derelict. The station area at the junction of Victoria Rd and Lowestoft Rd has been cleared of buildings and converted to a pleasant grassed area, used by local children, and those walking dogs especially. North of this, however, the deep cuttings have degenerated into rubbish dumps. The proposed inner relief road from the south into Yarmouth is to be routed along this track.
